amendment.description: At the end of subtitle C of title XII of division A of the bill, add the following: SEC. 12xx. REPEAL OF UNITED STATES INSTITUTE OF PEACE ACT. Effective as of the date of the enactment of this Act, the United States Institute of Peace Act (title XVII of Public Law 98-525; 22 U.S.C. 4601 et seq.) is repealed.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 152 printed in House Report 112-88 to repeal Title VXII of the Department of Defense Authorization Act, 1985, which authorized the establishment of the United States Institute of Peace.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 372).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cravaack amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 194 (Roll no. 372).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. Cravaack.
